data.Name: Brine saturation
data.Description: Brine fills the connected pore volume. Porosity is determined as brine volume divided by bulk volume.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Helium injection
data.Description: Helium fills the connected pore volume. Porosity is determined as helium volume divided by bulk volume.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Summation of fluids
data.Description: The pore volume is computed by measuring and summing oil, gas, and water volumes present in a freshly recovered core sample. Porosity is determined by dividing pore volume by bulk volume of the rock sample.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Other
data.Description: Historical or unusual method; details should be captured in remarks
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
